content: crochet this pretty and practical farmhouse dishcloth using just 39 grams of yarn and simple stitches like chains double_crochet and clusters perfect for using up leftover cotton yarn and adding a handmade touch to your kitchen crochet this pretty and practical farmhouse dishcloth using just 39 grams of yarn and simple stitches like chains double_crochet and clusters perfect for using up leftover cotton yarn and adding a handmade touch to your kitchen this is just one of the patterns included in our dishcloth of the month club collection join the cal newsletter here https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/47a92529ba https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/47a92529ba **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
